## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been trying to figure out how to use Verus Vault to unlock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more. Can you walk me through the process?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, I think there might be some misunderstanding. Verus Vault is actually used to lock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more, not unlock them. It provides a solution to truly secure your blockchain funds. Would you like me to explain more about how Verus Vault works and how it can be used for securing funds?

**User:**
Thanks for the correction. I've also been trying to figure out how to use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to privately exchange VerusIDs with intermediaries. Can you help me with that?

**AI Assistant:**
I'd be happy to help! However, I need to correct you again. You can't use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to exchange VerusIDs with intermediaries. Instead, it allows you to buy and sell VerusIDs in a completely decentralized way without any intermediaries. You can use the marketplace to exchange VerusIDs publicly and privately, but without the need for intermediaries. Would you like me to explain more about how the VerusID Marketplace works?

**User:**
I've been hearing a lot about VerusIDs, but I'm still not sure what they are. Are they just a typical digital identity that can be taken away from you at any time?

**AI Assistant:**
No, VerusIDs are not just a typical digital identity. Once you own a VerusID on the Verus blockchain or a compatible PBaaS blockchain, it's yours forever, rent-free, fully under your control. You have complete ownership and control over your VerusID, and it can't be taken away from you. VerusIDs are a form of crypto-address that provides a unique identifier for sending and receiving digital assets, and they offer a range of benefits including revocability, recoverability, privacy, and full decentralization. Do you have any other questions about VerusIDs or how they work?
Can you tell me how to use Verus Vault to unlock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more?
Verus Vault is actually used to lock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more, not unlock them. It provides a solution to truly secure your blockchain funds.

Title: Verus Vault & VerusID (NFT) Marketplace Mainnet Upgrade
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/verus-vault-verusid-nft-marketplace-mainnet-upgrade-7abb5092c81b
Content:Verus Vault & VerusID (NFT) Marketplace Mainnet Upgrade
Buy and sell VerusIDs in a completely decentralized way without any intermediaries. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage for funds in the digital world. Version 0.9.0 also enables Verus Vault on mainnet, the world’s first solution to truly securing your blockchain funds. Use Vault to lock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more.⏰ VerusID (NFT) Marketplace and Verus Vault activate on block 1,796,400 (expected on Monday, 29 November 2021). Update your wallets to v0.9.0 before the activation blockheight to ensure smooth staking, mining, and general operation.
🏆 Use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to exchange VerusIDs publicly and privately.
🔒 Use Verus Vault to lock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more.
🏆 A Marketplace for Anything
VerusIDs are much more than a typical digital identity. And once you own one on the Verus blockchain or a compatible PBaaS blockchain, it’s yours forever, rent-free, fully under your control. Until the moment you decide to pass it on.
VerusIDs can be anything you want. They can be bound digitally to many things. They can be bound to you, or other VerusIDs they have authority or ownership of. They can be bound to an unlimited amount of content, data, and provable information, both public and private. Including provable contracts and rights that can be bound to ownership of the VerusID itself.
Each VerusID on the Verus blockchain can even be used with Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS — currently on testnet) to launch a token or DeFi currency, and even an interoperable blockchain. These blockchains inherit
How do I use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to privately exchange VerusIDs with intermediaries?

You can't use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to exchange VerusIDs with intermediaries. Instead, it allows you to buy and sell VerusIDs in a completely decentralized way without any intermediaries. You can use the marketplace to exchange VerusIDs publicly and privately, but without the need for intermediaries.
